title: Unable to join a game
body:
Everytime I try to queue up for a game I get a connection timeout error, then it doesn't allow me to re-queue for 15 minutes for "dodging queue" even though I never joined one. 

I've already flushed my DNS, made sure IPV4 was set up and ported properly and restarted my computer and my router. Nothing works.

replies.body: Done all of that, it only happens when queue times are higher than 2-3 minutes.

Sounds like there might be a very particular issue causing those timeouts. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look at what's going on!

If the client is kicking you out a queue but you're never even seeing a match found notification, it's a good sign that your network is having some difficulties talking with the matchmaking servers. When this happens, the client never gets the notification from our servers so it can't let you into the lobby. 

You've hit most of the steps here already, but let's check the rest of the tips in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure we've covered all our bases.
